sorry for 3 posts in a row, but just to clarify: The girls on the last page are congratulating the MC on his decision and wishing him the best. Then the "friends" congratulate him too in the same joking way you and I would be congratulating him if we took the girls off his hands. And at the top of the last page, MC is till talking about his "perfect world" is gone and he'll have to find it elsewhere. He hasn't learned. He basically wants pure girls that only look at him and his complaints to his friends where actually him indirectly bragging about his harem life (perfect world).

say he never showed any interest. After first 2 sisters fuck, they agree to date the respective boy. Then big sis (blonde) finds out they were fucking and calls house meeting and lets MC know all their frustrations. MC asks if the sisters were REALLY all into him and they nod sadly. MC then almost confesses love to blonde. But before he can, blonde tells him he can masterbate while she gets fucked by both friends. they fuck. MC disgusted. Blonde says he can fuck her, but her holes are filled with other men's semen. MC disgusted that his perfect world that he made is falling apart and says he only has one choice. He throws the girls' bags and says he's moving out of the house. Everyone congratulates him because they don't care. 2 sisters have boyfriends and older sis has 2 fuck buddies I guess. MC mad they don't care. Moral: Don't pull that half-assed shit you see in harem anime; shoot your shot, my brothers. MC had 1 last opportunity to save relationship with blonde after her 3some.

The story: Think of this guy as typical anime harem MC that leads on tons of girls but won't do anything with them. The girls are sisters and were ALWAYS making moves on him like getting naked in front of him etc. Basically the bathroom shenanigans at the start. MC then always complains about his "peaceful world" he created where he would always have the girls interested in him, but never actually do it for some reason. MC complains to his guy friends that they wouldn't survive with what he has to deal with everyday with the girls and they come visit the house that MC and sisters are staying at. The house is low on funds so they let MC's friends in after blonde sis (house leader) sees they brought food. Jump a little bit. Turns out the 3 sisters were "bitches?" I guess and always wanted to fuck MC, but he never engaged and now the girls are pent up and frustrated. MC's friends shoot their shot and fuck while asking if the girls have anything with the MC. The first 2 girls deny and...
